attributes.review: I had hope for this app and was excited to download it. Unfortunately the information was extremely biased and unreliable. I have yet to decide on who I will vote for in November but this app didn’t help and made trump look bad.

attributes.review: Love to keep up to date with the great changes this fine person is making ... don’t let the haters and sheep that do 0 research tell you anything make up your one decision in life
